li.title: acute
li.p: an angle with measure less than a right angle

li.title: circle
li.p: set of points equidistant from a given point

li.title: complementary
li.p: the angle sum is that of a right angle

li.title: line
li.p: undefined term (see chair)

li.title: obtuse
li.p: an angle with measure greater than a right angle

li.title: parallel
li.p: two lines which do not intersect

li.title: perpendicular
li.p: two line segments intersect in a right angle

li.title: plane
li.p: undefined term (see table)

li.title: point
li.p: undefined term (see mug)

li.title: right angle
li.p: an angle with measure \pi/2

li.title: supplementary
li.p: the angle sum is that of two right angles

li.title: transversal
li.p: a line crossing two other (typically parallel) lines

li.title: triangle
li.p: the shape consisting of line segments connecting three, non-colinear points
